div.h2: San Jon Municipal Schools' Continuous Learning Plan

a.title: Learning Hub
a.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; background-color: white; font-size: 13px; font-family: latoregular;

strong.br:
Please take a few minutes to read the Letter to Parents.
Students are spending more time than ever with technology during this continuous learning. Do you wish you knew more about the platforms, apps, and other media that your kids are using? Visit https://www.commonsensemedia.org/ for articles, videos, and movie & book reviews.
As we all continue to navigate this road of unknowns, we thank you all for your patience and understanding as we figure out and plan how to best educate our students.

br.span: Friend us on Facebook: San Jon Schools
